original: Årmann, Carl Nils Gabriel, överste, Skövde, f. 24/8/94 i Stora Mellösa, Örebro 1., av godsäg. Nils Ä. o. Alva Lange. G. 26 m. Brita Flach. Barn: Jan f. 28, Christina 31. — Stud:ex. 13, oif:ex. 15, AIHS ak 17, AIHS hk 18-20, lär. v. AIHS 28-34. Res. t. USA 39. Fänr. v. Uppl. art :reg. 15, löjtn. 17, kapten v. gen:stab. 26, v. Norrb. art:kår 34, major v. gen:stab. 36, över-stelöjtn. 39, v. Norrb. art :kår 40, överste o. chef f. AIHS 41, f. Norrl. art:-reg. 42, f. Bergslag. art:reg. 43’, stf. mihbef. i III. milo^ fr. 46. Ordf. i Skövde flygkl. 46, i Skövde-avd. av skid- o. fril:främj. 46. Hobbies: jakt, friluftsliv. KSOlkl, RVO, FFrK3kl m sv, LKrVA.
translated: Årmann, Carl Nils Gabriel, Colonel, Skövde, born on 24/8/94 in Stora Mellösa, Örebro 1st district, son of landowner Nils Ä. and Alva Lange. Married on 26 with Brita Flach. Children: Jan born in 28, Christina in 31. Education: Student exam 13, non-commissioned officer exam 15, AIHS (Army Infantry High School) academy 17, AIHS officer candidate school 18-20, teacher at AIHS 28-34. Traveled to the USA in 39. Ensign in the Uppland Artillery Regiment in 15, lieutenant in 17, captain in the general staff in 26, in the Norrbotten Artillery Corps in 34, major in the general staff in 36, lieutenant colonel in 39, in the Norrbotten Artillery Corps in 40, colonel and commander of AIHS in 41, in the Norrland Artillery Regiment in 42, in the Bergslagen Artillery Regiment in 43, deputy commander of the III. Military District from 46. Chairman of the Skövde Flying Club in 46, and of the Skövde branch of ski and outdoor promotion in 46. Hobbies: hunting, outdoor activities. Knight of the Order of the Polar Star, Royal German Cross, Third Class with Swords, Member of the Royal War Academy.
